name: Shrines of Eternity
description:
Shrines of Eternity is a single player puzzle game prototype quickly made to test a few game mechanics for the possibility and viability of a much more polished future release.

You start on the island of the Sun and Moon. You do not know how you got there, but you have one goal: find eternity. Many have failed before you and you must use your wits to solve the few puzzles on the island.

Controls:
Movement - WASD
Jump - Space
Left Click - Grab
Right Click - Throw
E - Interact

*Installer contains ONLY the game files*
